edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.rationaleData
Class Contingency

java.lang.Object
  edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.rationaleData.RationaleElement
      edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.rationaleData.Contingency
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Contingency
extends RationaleElement
implements java.io.Serializable

Defines a contingency. Contingencies, a term that NASA uses in spacecraft design, indicate the % of safety margin used when determining things like the weight of a spacecraft. This is a way of dealing with uncertainty and the contingency level varies depending on how well known the problem is.

Author:
burgeje
